title: [美國]Ben Carson獲美國國會委任美國住房及城市發展部

replies.msg:
WASHINGTON — Ben Carson, an acclaimed neurosurgeon-turned-politician, can now add a new title to his résumé: secretary of housing and urban development.

The Senate voted 58-41 Thursday morning to confirm Mr. Carson in a rare show of bipartisanship. Unlike other cabinet members chosen by President Trump, Mr. Carson, who has no experience running a large federal bureaucracy, did not face much pushback from Democrats during his confirmation process.

source: [url]https://www.nytimes.com/2017/03/02/us/politics/ben-carson-housing-urban-development.html?_r=0
